title: CryptopreneurBrainboss

created_time: October 17, 2023, 02:32:11 AMLast edit: February 16, 2025, 03:18:58 AM by CryptopreneurBrainboss
content: ★☆★ Bitvest Plinko Signature Campaign ★☆★Bitvest Gambling thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1221154.0★ Campaign Manager:  CryptopreneurBrainboss ★ | (Bitvest Campaign SPREADSHEET ) Bitvest.io➡  If you like our campaign feel free to leave a Bitvest review at our gambling thread above.  ⬅Apply Instructions for New UsersPost in the following format:Code:User: xPosition to Apply: xPosts Start: XAddress: (Your BTC Address)Example:Code:User: ExamplePosition to Apply: HeroPosts Start: 1350Address: 17jJnL66ShEuAUQt1eZby7ohce6n2mykUnOnce the following has been supplied and assuming there is an available position, you will be included in the new google doc below by the campaign manager.Bitvest Escrow Address: Current balance: Signature Campaign Terms1.Failing to meet the minimum post requirement for two rounds will result in a tier payment drop and another user in 1 lower tier automatically swapping with your tier position, each consecutive failures for the minimum post requirement will result in additional tier.2. Signature Spamming that is detrimental to the discussions in threads will not count as payment. If you're reported or caught for spamming you'll be removed from this campaign after 2 strike. 3. If you have negative trust on level 2 default settings, you aren't allowed to participate in this campaign, and further more if you achieve negative trust on level 2 while you are in this campaign, you will be terminated, denied payment and removed from the campaign.4. 15 Posts min per week to be eligible for payment/ 60 posts max per week to be paid for (More will count as 60). Burst posting isn't allowed (spread your posting between the weekdays).5. Bonus pay only apply up to 15 posts per week in the Gambling thread, and Gambling discussion sub-thread. Bonuses doesn't count on the games and rounds thread, and investor-based games thread6. Constructive Posts, 150 characters minimum, and quality ranking will occur base upon the quality of your posting, and the better you post the higher the tier you may achieve, users can be promote or demote base upon the quality of their posting. Local board posters are welcomed. 7. Spam such as referrals. Doesn't count towards your eligible payment posts.8. Payments are sent on Monday, Posts are counted Sunday 12:00 PM to Sunday 11:59 AM. All posts made after Sunday 11:59 AM accounts for the next week payment. We're using forum time so don't miscalculate. 9. Personal Message must be set to: ★Bitvest.io★ Play Plinko or Invest!Copy-Paste: ★Bitvest.io★ Play Plinko or Invest!All Full Member and up are required to use avatar:Avatar Link  Pay StructureFirst come First Serve For Tier Payment Positions: When a user in a tier leaves, the 1 lower tier users will bump up and fill that higher tier. Longer you stay, the more likely to be in Top Tier.Quote from: lightlord on March 24, 2024, 10:51:37 AMTier A)2 Heros @ 2000 Satoshis/Post | Bonus: 150 Satoshis(Extra) / Post2 Seniors @ 1400
